mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (login_name, user_name, pass_word, salt, enable, created_at, updated_at) values ( #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,

mapper.update:
update sys_user
login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pass_word = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=TINYINT},
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
